00022 #ifndef _MetabolizerPhenotyping_HEADER_
00023 #define _MetabolizerPhenotyping_HEADER_
00024 
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <map>
00027 #include <vector>
00028 #include <list>
00029 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00030 
00031 namespace affymetrix
00032 {
00033 
00034 /*! The phenotype and associated activities. */
00035 typedef struct _PhenotypeCallType
00036 {
00037 public:
00038         std::string phenotype;
00039         std::string activity1;
00040         std::string activity2;
00041 
00042         _PhenotypeCallType() { };
00043 
00044         _PhenotypeCallType(const std::string &p, const std::string &a1, const std::string &a2)
00045         {
00046                 phenotype = p;
00047                 activity1 = a1;
00048                 activity2 = a2;
00049         };
00050 } PhenotypeCallType;
00051 
00052 /*! A map of allele pairs to phenotype */
00053 typedef std::map<std::string /*allele pair*/, PhenotypeCallType /*phenotype*/> GeneMetabolizerPhenotypeMap;
00054 
00055 /*! A map of phenotypes for all genes */
00056 typedef std::map<std::string /*gene*/, GeneMetabolizerPhenotypeMap> MetabolizerPhenotypeMap;
00057 
00058 /*! Holds the results of the metabolizer analysis for a single gene. */
00059 typedef struct _MetabolizerResultType
00060 {       
00061         std::string index;
00062         std::string chpFile;
00063         std::string gene;
00064         std::string knownCall;
00065         std::string unknownCall;
00066         std::string code;
00067         std::vector<std::string> phenotypes;
00068         std::vector<std::string> activities;
00069         std::string finalPhenotype;
00070         std::string finalActivity;
00071 } MetabolizerResultType;
00072 
00073 /*! A list of results */
00074 typedef std::list<MetabolizerResultType> MetabolizerResultsType;
00075 
00076 /*! Implements a method to calculate metabolizer phenotypes */
00077 class MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine : public BaseEngine
00078 {
00079 private:
00080 
00081         /*! The map of alleles to phenotype */
00082         MetabolizerPhenotypeMap metabolizerPhenotypeMap;
00083 
00084         /*! The results of the metabolizer analysis */
00085         MetabolizerResultsType metabolizerResults;
00086 
00087         /*! The description of the phenotype calls. */
00088         std::vector<std::string> phenotypeCallDescs;
00089 
00090         /*! Information in the metabolizer file to pass along to the user in the output translation file. */
00091         std::vector<std::string> userInformation;
00092 
00093         /*! Read the data from the metabolizer bin file.
00094          * @param fileName The name of the bin file.
00095          */
00096         void ReadMetabolizerBinFile();
00097 
00098         /*! Extract the contents of the allele translation table file and compute
00099          * the metabolizer phenotypes for each gene of each CHP file.
00100          */
00101         void ProcessAlleleTranslationFile();
00102 
00103         /*! Create MD5's of the input and output files. */
00104         void CreateMd5File();
00105 
00106         /*! Initialize the members. */
00107         void Init();
00108 
00109         /*! Define all options. */
00110         void defineOptions();
00111 
00112         /*! Run the workflow to compute the phenotypes */
00113         void runImp();
00114 
00115         /*! Check the options. */
00116         void checkOptionsImp();
00117 
00118 public:
00119         
00120         /*! Get the engine name */
00121         virtual std::string getEngineName() { return MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::EngineName(); }
00122 
00123         /*! Get the engine name */
00124         static const std::string EngineName() { return "MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine"; }
00125 
00126         /*! A class to register the summary engine. */
00127         class Reg : public EngineReg
00128         {
00129         public:
00130                 /*! Constructor - register the summary engine. */
00131                 Reg() : EngineReg(MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine::EngineName())
00132                 {
00133                 }
00134 
00135                 /*! Creates an object.
00136                  * @return The object.
00137                  */
00138                 BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine; }
00139         };
00140 
00141         /*! The one and only registration object. */
00142         static Reg reg;
00143 
00144         /*! Converts the type to the summary engine type.
00145          * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00146          * @return The summary engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00147          */
00148         static MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
00149 
00150         /*! Constructor */
00151         MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine();
00152 
00153         /*! Destructor */
00154         ~MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine();
00155         
00156         /*! The results of the metabolizer analysis */
00157         const MetabolizerResultsType& MetabolizerResults() const { return metabolizerResults; }
00158         
00159         /*! The description of the phenotype calls. */
00160         const std::vector<std::string>& PhenotypeCallDescs() const { return phenotypeCallDescs; }
00161         
00162         /*! Information in the metabolizer file to pass along to the user in the output translation file. */
00163         const std::vector<std::string>& UserInformation() const { return userInformation; }
00164 };
00165 
00166 }
